text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3” 144Hz IPS-Type FHD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB SSHD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-DS76 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3” 144Hz IPS-Type FHD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB SSHD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-DS76 is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3” 144Hz IPS-Type FHD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB SSHD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-DS76 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3” 144Hz IPS-Type FHD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB SSHD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-DS76!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3” 144Hz IPS-Type FHD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB SSHD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-DS76!
